review_text: Love, love, LOVE this ice cream maker.  Very easy to use and clean and good basic recipes included in the appliance's booklet.  If you want a lighter ice cream that doesn't have such a fatty aftertaste, however, try 1/2 & 1/2 instead of heavy cream.  I wish Cuisinart would include some vegan options using almond and coconut milk, too.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
